title: Driving theory test pass rates in the United Kingdom 2007 - 2019 by gender
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 2 lines namely Male, and Female. The y axis represents Pass rates and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Male, and Female are gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Pass rates in descending order is: 1. Female, and lastly, 2. Male.
Throughout the period, Female generally had the highest Pass rates relative to others with an average of 58.87, and it reached its maximum at 2007/08 with a value of 68.9.
Male mostly had the least Pass rates with a mean value of 53.77, which peaked at 2008/09 with a value of 62.6.
